column5: I just printed some of my bookmarked threads from the old site which had some good information on them.  Just a reminder to everyone unless there is a way to save them electronically.

Hey Mistyriver, you don't need to print them, but you can save them to a folder on your hard drive...might have to create them in Word or something first, then they are always handy on your computer.  Just remember to make a back up disk incase your computer dies  Maureen
I would think they are going to keep the old site..it should be a searchable data base or more
